Dracona is also at the Ark, and Dracona believes whatever she does.....what
she believes cannot be changed............Dracona is a bit crazy, but
intelligent.......and whatever she believes you have to go along
with.....she could be believeing that they are on mars, but their not..get
it?.........now lets continue......
